name: Crypto Quantique
description:
Crypto Quantique is a deep technology company that has developed a transformational cybersecurity technology, using the most advanced techniques in cryptography and quantum physics, designed to ensure that device security becomes foundational and end-to-end IoT security becomes standard practice.

Founded by Dr Shahram Mossayebi (CEO, PhD in Post-Quantum Cryptography), Dr Patrick Camilleri (CTO, PhD. Eng) and Kumi Thiruchelvam (CCO, MEng), Crypto Quantique has created the world's first proven quantum driven secure chip design for standard silicon which is coupled to an end to end supporting architecture encompassing cryptographic key and lifecycle management.
 
Their ground-breaking technology radically simplifies the process of generating a hardware root of trust in an IoT device, solves the issue of secure onboarding an IoT device in an untrusted environment and plugs the gaping device security hole that currently exists in the IoT ecosystem.

team.name: Amos Manasseh
team.bioHtml: Entrepreneurial leader, 30 years’ experience in the Telco, Digital Media and Entertainment. Launched digital products & services in USA, UK, Europe, Asia.

team.title: Senior Analog Designer
team.name: Alberto Gomez Saiz
team.bioHtml: Imperial College Graduate, Analog and Mixed Signal IC Designer, passionate about open source EDA and multidisciplinary learning

jobs.title: Cryptography Engineer
jobs.description:
Would you like to be part of a dynamic team working at the cutting edge of cybersecurity and quantum technology? Come work as a cryptography engineer at our growing company with opportunities to grow and learn in an exciting startup environment in central London. 

The Company:

Crypto Quantique is a young, VC-backed company operating in the cybersecurity space. Founded on ground-breaking research, the company is building secure integrated circuits that harness quantum effects at the microscopic level for use in the IoT and other sectors.
 
Our team has a variety of backgrounds including experienced engineers (we have a combined work experience of decades), several PhDs and some more recent graduates.

We’re operating at the intersection of two trending technology fields, quantum physics and cybersecurity - you’ll be learning about, and developing, bleeding edge technology. 

Job Overview:

Our growing company is seeking to hire a Cryptography Engineer who will work to develop the security solution offered with our Quantum Driven Secure Chip.  

As part of the team, you will explore cryptographic methods that may be used with our core technology to improve the security of the Internet of Things.  The role is therefore highly research focussed and the work will be highly experimental in nature.

A PhD or an MSc in computer science, computer engineering or a related field is required.  

To succeed in this position, candidates should exhibit exceptional understanding of cryptography and problem-solving skills.

Deep understanding of PKI, key exchange and quantum-safe algorithm is desired.

You should be resourceful, analytical and display good communication and team-working abilities.  

Previous experience in a cryptography/cyber security role is a plus. 
 
Responsibilities and Duties:

- Developing and verifying the architecture of the Crypto Quantique security solution.

- Verifying/testing the algorithms/implementations used with the Quantum Driven Secure Chip.

- Participating in developing cryptographic libraries and APIs for use as part of the Crypto Quantique product suite.

- Creating documentation to explain the security and benefits of Crypto Quantique’s solutions.

- Writing patents and academic papers where appropriate.

- Collaborating with other CQ employees to achieve team goals and milestones.

- Attending talks, seminars and other events relevant to Crypto Quantique.

Qualifications and Requirements:

- PhD in mathematics, computer science, or a related field. Candidate with an MSc degree in the same fields with enough experience are also qualified.

- Strong understanding of cyber security.

- Proven cyber security research experience.

- Some experience with computer programming is a bonus.
        - Knowledge of C, C++ or Python.

- Knowledge of or experience with Agile development methodologies is a bonus.

- A willingness to learn new programming languages and technologies.

- Adaptability and strong problem-solving skills.

- Ability to work as part of a team.

Why Should You Apply?

- Excellent growth and development opportunities.

- Exciting and dynamic work environment.

We particularly welcome applications from people from groups under-represented in the Cyber Security industry.

jobs.title: Digital System on Chip Design Engineer
jobs.description:
- JOB SUMMARY

We are expanding our world-class security hardware team, seeking a Digital SoC Design Engineer to work on cutting-edge secure IoT devices. The candidate will develop complex digital SoC ICs in all areas of IP design and verification and develop custom digital blocks to interface with Crypto Quantique's custom analogue IP. 

The role also involves taking ownership of the backend implementation activities which involves carrying out all aspects of the digital backend flow for a new product road map, including physical synthesis, STA and scan pattern generation.

- RESPONSIBILITIES

* RTL coding of finite state machines and cryptographic blocks
* Digital Verification using SystemVerilog/SystemC
* RTL and gate level simulation and debug
* RTL verification and synthesis at module and top level
* Logic synthesis, STA, floorplanning, Place & Route (P&R)
* Full back-end implementation using Cadence Innovus

- EXPERIENCE

* Proven experience in RTL coding
* Familiar with the Cadence Stylus flow
* Familiar with the mixed-signal flow
* A number of years' experience working on physical implementation / backend design of digital ICs
* Familiarity with C and Matlab a plus
* Perl and python scripting experience a plus
* Excellent communication skills and ability to work independently.

- QUALIFICATIONS

The successful applicant will have at least a Master’s in electrical engineering, 5 years of hands-on experience, is familiar with the Cadence ecosystem and is knowledgeable in the field of digital circuit design and digital IC design flow.

- SALARY

A competitive salary based on education level and experience will be offered.

This is a great opportunity for a digital SoC engineer to work alongside experienced analogue IC engineers in the exploding field of security and connected IoT devices.

jobs.title: Full Stack Software Engineer - Cloud
jobs.description:
- COMPANY OVERVIEW
Crypto Quantique is a young VC-backed deep technology company that has developed a transformational cybersecurity technology, using the most advanced techniques in cryptography and quantum physics, designed to ensure that device security becomes foundational and end-to-end IoT security becomes standard practice.

Founded on ground-breaking research, the company is building a hardware security-as-a-service platform based on secure integrated circuits that harness quantum effects for use in the IoT. We’re operating at the intersection of two trending technology fields, quantum physics and cybersecurity.

* Would you like to be part of a dynamic team working at the cutting edge of IoT, cybersecurity and quantum technology? 
* We’re looking for two mid to senior full stack software engineers to come work at our growing company with opportunities to grow and learn in an exciting startup environment in central London.

- JOB OVERVIEW
We are looking for two full stack software engineers who specialise in creating software to interface IoT technology with cloud computing platforms, and the integration and deployment of associated distributed cloud services. You will be part of a team building a powerful and innovative solution to enable enterprises to on-board and manage Crypto Quantique secured devices from birth to death.

As part of the team, you will be responsible for developing cryptographic libraries, associated Rest APIs, and backend and UI systems combining these elements into an application deployable to existing cloud systems.

To succeed in this position, candidates should exhibit strong programming and problem-solving skills. You should be resourceful, analytical and display good communication and team-working abilities. Previous experience in a cryptography/security software development or PKI is a plus.

- RESPONSIBILITIES AND DUTIES
* Implementation of the Crypto Quantique cloud architecture
* Produce well structured, secure, scalable and reliable code
* Developing applications for execution in AWS and Azure cloud
* Developing cryptographic libraries and associated APIs that will be used as part of the Crypto Quantique product suite
* Verifying and deploying the Crypto Quantique software libraries
* Troubleshooting and debugging developed software
* Supporting the end to end documentation process

- SKILLS
As a software engineer you will possess some of the following skills. Whereas you don’t need to know all these things, we are a cross functional team and use a broad technology stack, so a real desire and demonstrable aptitude for learning new technologies quickly is important;

* Software design and development
  o Embedded and Arduino programming with C or Rust
  o Golang and Python backend programming
  o Development of REST APIs
  o UI development with Javascript frameworks such as Angular

* Distributed microservices architectures
  o Serverless architectures, AWS Lambda and DynamoDB
  o Microservices
  o Kubernetes

* DevOps, Docker, test automation and deployment (CI/CD), Linux and Bash

* Experienced in delivering high quality software in an Agile development process

- NICE TO HAVE
Experience working with and developing cryptography libraries, PKCS11, X509 PKI

- DESIRED ATTRIBUTES
* Highly motivated
* A willingness to learn new programming languages and technologies
* Adaptability and strong problem-solving skills
* Organized approach
* Ability to work as part of a team

- QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE
* Bachelor’s in computer science, computer engineering or related field, +5 years’ experience.

- LOCATION
* Central London

- WHY SHOULD I APPLY?
* Excellent growth and development opportunities
* Exciting and dynamic work environment
* Opportunity to work with proven bleeding edge technology designed for the real world

Crypto Quantique is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.
